question: How many artists are there?
gt_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS n FROM Artist;

question: List the first 5 artist names in alphabetical order.
gt_sql: SELECT Name FROM Artist ORDER BY Name LIMIT 5;
gt_answer: A Cor Do Som | AC/DC | Aaron Copland & London Symphony Orchestra | Aaron Goldberg | Academy of St. Martin in the Fields & Sir Neville Marriner

question: How many albums are there in total?
gt_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS n FROM Album;

question: Which artist has the most albums? Return the artist name and album count.
gt_sql: SELECT ar.Name AS artist_name, COUNT(al.AlbumId) AS album_count FROM Artist ar JOIN Album al ON ar.ArtistId = al.ArtistId GROUP BY ar.ArtistId ORDER BY album_count DESC, artist_name ASC LIMIT 1;

question: How many tracks are there in total?
gt_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS n FROM Track;

question: What is the average track length in milliseconds? Round to the nearest integer.
gt_sql: SELECT ROUND(AVG(Milliseconds)) AS avg_ms FROM Track;

question: How many customers are there?
gt_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS n FROM Customer;

question: How many invoices are there?
gt_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS n FROM Invoice;
